setting.title: User Settings

rules.space:
1  You will help the community to do a Twitter Space by using your Twitter account.
2  Please use the community’s logo as your avatar of vouched twitter account before you start your space and keep it until 15 mins after you return back your space’s URL.
3  Please pin your invitation link of this quest when you doing it.
rules.promotion:
1  Please quote the promotion quest link with your comment.
2  Don't forget to add your quest invitation link to your comment.
3  Please put your quote twitter URL back after that.
rules.bird:
1  Please  write a tweet  for the commuinity.
2  Please add the quest invitation link to your tweet.
3  Please put back the URL of your tweet after that.
rules.article:
1  Please  write a Twitter Arcitle  for the commuinity.
2  Please add the quest invitation link to your article.
3  Please put back the URL of your Twitter Article after that.
rules.invite:
1  Help the community get new friends
2  Please  share the quest invitation link wherever you like 
3  Enjoy the crazy game.

judgment.space:
1  The total score is 100, with Brand accounting for 10%, Friends for 40%, and Popularity for 50%.
2  The Brand score is determined by your avatar; changing your avatar earns you 10 points, while keeping it the same will yield you 0 points.
3  The Friends score is based on the number of users you invite through your quest invitation.
4  The Popularity score is determined by the audience in your Twitter Space.
5  The person with the highest data will receive the maximum score and bounty, including the Brand, Friends, and Popularity scores.
6  Everyone will have a total score, which will determine the amount of your bounty.
7  If there are a total of 20 chances, but you rank 21st, unfortunately, you will not receive any bounty.
8  You only have one chance to participate in this quest.
9  If no one qualifies for the bounty, it will be returned to the wallet of the bounty task initiator.
judgment.promotion:
1   Total score is 100 including Buzz 10%,  Discuss 10%,  Identify 10%,  Popular 10%, Spread 20%,  Friends 40%.
2   Buzz is decided by your quote comment.
3   Discuss s is decided by the comments  of your quote.
4   Identify is decided by the retweet of your quote.
5   Popular is decided by the likes of your quote.
6   Spread is decided by the impressions of your quote.
7   Friends is decided by the  number of users invited through your quest invitation. 
8   Your total scores determines your bounty.
9   If the total chances are 20 but you are 21st, sorry you can get nothing.
10   You only have 1 chance for this quest.
11  If no one meets the bounty, the bounty will be returned to the bounty owner's wallet.

judgment.invite:
1   Total score is decided by the total amout
2   Total amout is determined by the new friends you invite within the valid time period.
3   Everyone will have a total score, it decide the amount of your bounty
4   If the total chances are 20 but you are in 21st, sorry you can get nothing
5   You only have 1 chance for this quest
6  If no one meets the bounty, the bounty will be returned to the bounty owner's wallet

create.description: Create a community token process in AO.{lineBreak}The token process is totally owned by its creator, and the initial supply is entirely allocated to the process.
